name: Space Dots - The Line Puzzle
description:
Solve the tricky "one touch draw" puzzles and travel around in our solar system.

Can you visit all planets of our solar system by solving "drawings in one line" puzzles.

Enjoy the beautiful graphics, and learn something new about our solar system.

The 64 levels will challenge you.

Compare your results with friends and all players on the highscore lists.

Can you unlock all achievments?

The rules are very simple, connect all the dots with one line. The difficulty is that you can't draw twice the same line.
